service: AWS Partner Central Account service provides APIs for managing partner accounts, connections, and profiles within the AWS Partner Network. This service enables partners to create and manage their partner profiles, establish connections with other partners, and maintain their account information.

operations.AcceptConnectionInvitation: Accepts a connection invitation from another partner, establishing a formal partnership connection between the two parties.
operations.AssociateAwsTrainingCertificationEmailDo: Associates an email domain with AWS training and certification for the partner account, enabling automatic verification of employee certifications.
operations.CancelConnection: Cancels an existing connection between partners, terminating the partnership relationship.
operations.CancelConnectionInvitation: Cancels a pending connection invitation before it has been accepted or rejected.
operations.CancelProfileUpdateTask: Cancels an in-progress profile update task, stopping any pending changes to the partner profile.
operations.CreateConnectionInvitation: Creates a new connection invitation to establish a partnership with another organization.
operations.CreatePartner: Creates a new partner account in the AWS Partner Network with the specified details and configuration.
operations.DisassociateAwsTrainingCertificationEmai: Removes the association between an email domain and AWS training and certification for the partner account.
operations.GetAllianceLeadContact: Retrieves the alliance lead contact information for a partner account.
operations.GetConnection: Retrieves detailed information about a specific connection between partners.
operations.GetConnectionInvitation: Retrieves detailed information about a specific connection invitation.
operations.GetConnectionPreferences: Retrieves the connection preferences for a partner account, including access settings and exclusions.
operations.GetPartner: Retrieves detailed information about a specific partner account.
operations.GetProfileUpdateTask: Retrieves information about a specific profile update task.
operations.GetProfileVisibility: Retrieves the visibility settings for a partner profile, determining who can see the profile information.
operations.GetVerification: Retrieves the current status and details of a verification process for a partner account. This operation allows partners to check the progress and results of business or registrant verification processes.
operations.ListConnectionInvitations: Lists connection invitations for the partner account, with optional filtering by status, type, and other criteria.
operations.ListConnections: Lists active connections for the partner account, with optional filtering by connection type and participant.
operations.ListPartners: Lists partner accounts in the catalog, providing a summary view of all partners.
operations.ListTagsForResource: Lists all tags associated with a specific AWS Partner Central Account resource.
operations.PutAllianceLeadContact: Creates or updates the alliance lead contact information for a partner account.
operations.PutProfileVisibility: Sets the visibility level for a partner profile, controlling who can view the profile information.
operations.RejectConnectionInvitation: Rejects a connection invitation from another partner, declining the partnership request.
operations.SendEmailVerificationCode: Sends an email verification code to the specified email address for account verification purposes.
operations.StartProfileUpdateTask: Initiates a profile update task to modify partner profile information asynchronously.
operations.StartVerification: Initiates a new verification process for a partner account. This operation begins the verification workflow for either business registration or individual registrant identity verification as required by AWS Partner Central.
operations.TagResource: Adds or updates tags for a specified AWS Partner Central Account resource.
operations.UntagResource: Removes specified tags from an AWS Partner Central Account resource.
operations.UpdateConnectionPreferences: Updates the connection preferences for a partner account, modifying access settings and exclusions.

AccessDeniedException.base: The request was denied due to insufficient permissions. The caller does not have the required permissions to perform this operation.

refs.RejectConnectionInvitationRequest$Reason: The reason for rejecting the connection invitation.

refs.RejectConnectionInvitationResponse$Invit: The message that was included with the original connection invitation.

ResourceNotFoundException.base: The specified resource could not be found. This may occur when referencing a resource that does not exist or has been deleted.

refs.ResourceNotFoundException$Reason: The specific reason why the resource was not found.

refs.GetConnectionPreferencesResponse$Revisio: The revision number of the connection preferences for optimistic locking.
refs.UpdateConnectionPreferencesRequest$Revis: The revision number of the connection preferences for optimistic locking.
refs.UpdateConnectionPreferencesResponse$Revi: The updated revision number of the connection preferences.

refs.SellerProfileSummary$Id: The unique identifier of the seller profile.

SellerProfileSummary.base: A summary view of a seller profile containing basic identifying information.

refs.Participant$SellerProfile: The seller profile information for the participant.

refs.AllianceLeadContact$FirstName: The first name of the alliance lead contact person.
refs.AllianceLeadContact$LastName: The last name of the alliance lead contact person.
refs.AllianceLeadContact$BusinessTitle: The business title or role of the alliance lead contact person.
refs.CancelConnectionInvitationResponse$Invit: The name of the person who sent the connection invitation.
refs.ConnectionTypeDetail$InviterName: The name of the person who initiated this connection type.
refs.CreateConnectionInvitationRequest$Name: The name of the person sending the connection invitation.
refs.CreateConnectionInvitationResponse$Invit: The name of the person who sent the connection invitation.
refs.CreatePartnerRequest$LegalName: The legal name of the organization becoming a partner.
refs.CreatePartnerResponse$LegalName: The legal name of the partner organization.
refs.GetConnectionInvitationResponse$InviterN: The name of the person who sent the connection invitation.
refs.GetPartnerResponse$LegalName: The legal name of the partner organization.
refs.PartnerSummary$LegalName: The legal name of the partner organization.
refs.RejectConnectionInvitationResponse$Invit: The name of the person who sent the connection invitation.

ServiceQuotaExceededException.base: The request was rejected because it would exceed a service quota or limit. This may occur when trying to create more resources than allowed by the service limits.

refs.ServiceQuotaExceededException$Reason: The specific reason for the service quota being exceeded.

refs.BusinessValidationError$Message: A description of the business validation error.
refs.ErrorDetail$Locale: The locale or language code for the error message.
refs.FieldValidationError$Name: The name of the field that failed validation.
refs.FieldValidationError$Message: A description of the field validation error.
refs.ThrottlingException$ServiceCode: The service code associated with the throttling error.
refs.ThrottlingException$QuotaCode: The quota code associated with the throttling error.

Tag.base: A key-value pair used to associate metadata with AWS Partner Central Account resources.

refs.Tag$Key: The key name of the tag. Tag keys are case-sensitive.

refs.UntagResourceRequest$TagKeys: A list of tag keys to remove from the specified resource.

refs.CreatePartnerRequest$Tags: A list of tags to associate with the partner account for organization and billing purposes.
refs.ListTagsForResourceResponse$Tags: A list of tags associated with the specified resource.
refs.TagResourceRequest$Tags: A list of tags to add or update for the specified resource.

refs.Tag$Value: The value associated with the tag key. Tag values are case-sensitive.

refs.ListTagsForResourceRequest$ResourceArn: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to list tags for.
refs.ListTagsForResourceResponse$ResourceArn: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource that the tags are associated with.
refs.TagResourceRequest$ResourceArn: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to tag.
refs.UntagResourceRequest$ResourceArn: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to remove tags from.

TaskDetails.base: Contains detailed information about a profile update task including the changes to be made.

refs.CancelProfileUpdateTaskResponse$TaskDeta: The details of the profile update task that was canceled.
refs.GetProfileUpdateTaskResponse$TaskDetails: The details of the profile update task including what changes are being made.
refs.StartProfileUpdateTaskRequest$TaskDetail: The details of the profile updates to be performed.
refs.StartProfileUpdateTaskResponse$TaskDetai: The details of the profile update task that was started.

refs.TaskDetails$Description: The updated description for the partner profile.

ThrottlingException.base: The request was throttled due to too many requests being sent in a short period of time. The client should implement exponential backoff and retry the request.

refs.AccountSummary$Name: The name associated with the AWS account.
refs.LocalizedContent$DisplayName: The localized display name for the partner.
refs.PartnerProfile$DisplayName: The public display name for the partner organization.
refs.TaskDetails$DisplayName: The updated display name for the partner profile.

refs.UpdateConnectionPreferencesRequest$Exclu: The updated list of participant identifiers to exclude from connections.

refs.LocalizedContent$WebsiteUrl: The localized website URL for the partner.
refs.LocalizedContent$LogoUrl: The URL to the partner's logo image for this locale.
refs.PartnerProfile$LogoUrl: The URL to the partner's logo image.
refs.TaskDetails$WebsiteUrl: The updated website URL for the partner profile.
refs.TaskDetails$LogoUrl: The updated logo URL for the partner profile.

ValidationError.base: Contains information about a validation error, which can be either a field-level or business rule validation error.

refs.ValidationException$ErrorDetails: A list of detailed validation errors that occurred during request processing.

ValidationException.base: The request failed validation. One or more input parameters are invalid, missing, or do not meet the required format or constraints.

VerificationDetails.base: A union structure containing the specific details required for different types of verification processes supported by AWS Partner Central.

refs.StartVerificationRequest$VerificationDet: The specific details required for the verification process, including business information for business verification or personal information for registrant verification.

VerificationResponseDetails.base: A union structure containing the response details specific to different types of verification processes, providing type-specific information and results.

refs.GetVerificationResponse$VerificationResp: Detailed response information specific to the type of verification performed, including any verification-specific data or results.
refs.StartVerificationResponse$VerificationRe: Initial response details specific to the type of verification started, which may include next steps or additional requirements.

refs.GetVerificationResponse$VerificationStat: The current status of the verification process. Possible values include pending, in-progress, completed, failed, or expired.
refs.StartVerificationResponse$VerificationSt: The initial status of the verification process after it has been started. Typically this will be pending or in-progress.

refs.GetVerificationResponse$VerificationStat: Additional information explaining the current verification status, particularly useful when the status indicates a failure or requires additional action.
refs.StartVerificationResponse$VerificationSt: Additional information about the initial verification status, including any immediate feedback about the submitted verification details.

refs.GetVerificationRequest$VerificationType: The type of verification to retrieve information for. Valid values include business verification for company registration details and registrant verification for individual identity confirmation.
refs.GetVerificationResponse$VerificationType: The type of verification that was requested and processed.
refs.StartVerificationResponse$VerificationTy: The type of verification that was started based on the provided verification details.
